English: I want you to come at once.
French: Je veux que vous {{c::veniez}} de suite.

English: I want to make you happy.
He is a man of letters.
Do not eat too much cake.

French: Je vous rappelle dans la semaine.

English: Tell me the meaning of life.

French: Je le ferai un de ces jours.

English: He is a man of faith.

French: Il est simple de les distinguer.

English: They are easy to distinguish from each other.
